description: image of two buildings on a ledge rendered in gold-colored pigment against a dark blue sky; left building resembles a tower with a green slanted roof, green flag at top, and square windows moving up tower to top; right building is a small red house with a slanted roof; dark shading around bottom of both buildings
inscription: LLC, in pencil: 13/15 | bottom left edge, in pencil: 古い記憶 {Furui kioku} | LRC of sheet: Old Memory | on back, in LLC, in pencil: 1067
title: Old Memory
